mapper.insert: INSERT INTO etf_metadata (symbol, name, types, payment_day_of_month, ex_dividend_day_offset, description, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{symbol}, #{name}, #{types, typeHandler=com.etf.risk.adapter.persistence.typehandler.ETFTypeSetTypeHandler}, #{paymentDayOfMonth}, #{exDividendDayOffset}, #{description}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE etf_metadata SET name = #{name}, types = #{types, typeHandler=com.etf.risk.adapter.persistence.typehandler.ETFTypeSetTypeHandler}, payment_day_of_month = #{paymentDayOfMonth}, ex_dividend_day_offset = #{exDividendDayOffset}, description = #{description}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE symbol = #{symbol}
